name: PassResetHelper
description: This will help customer troubleshoot password issues.

plainTextMessage.value: Okay, let's get you the proper help. Enter 'technical support' to be directed to a technical support specialist.
No problem, I'm going to redirect you to our password reset website. Just click on the link and follow the steps to reset your password. www.Zfinity.com/password-reset .  Did this solve your problem?
Okay great ! If there is anything else I can help you with, simply say 'more options'. Otherwise have a great day and thank you for being a Z-finity customer.
